creator: Trust Power Ltd
descriptionHtml:
The free way to cut energy bills. Got a smart meter? Make it smarter with Loop!

A smart meter won’t save you money on its own, it’s just an energy meter. That’s where Loop can help. The free Loop app analyses your smart meter data and shows you easy ways to use less, save money and cut your eco-impact. On average, Loop users cut their energy use by 10%!

With spiralling energy prices and the climate emergency, there has never been a better time to take back control of your energy use. Simply download the Loop app, set up your account, then benefit from all Loop’s great energy-saving features. Loop is independent of your utility and is free to use for any household with a smart meter.

LEVEL UP YOUR EFFICIENCY
Efficiency has never been so important. On average Loop users reduce their usage by 10%. That’s a significant saving but many save much, much more. We help you understand what’s using the most energy in your home so you can make sensible decisions about what you use and when.

TURN OFF THE ALWAYS-ON
Phantom Load is our name for the stuff you leave on all the time. On average Phantom Load accounts for a third of an average household's electricity bill…but it doesn’t have to! Understand how much it’s costing you, how you compare to other households like yours, then make smart choices about which things to turn off.

️TEST SOLAR BEFORE INVESTING
Using your energy data, details about your house and weather information, we can show you the actual difference solar power could make to your monthly bills and your reliance on grid energy. Find out if it makes sense for you before investing with Loop’s unique solar simulator.

MONITOR YOUR HOME AND TRAIN YOUR ENERGY INSTINCT
Whilst your smart meter’s in-home display shows you what you’re using right now, Loop can help you track back over hours, days, weeks, months and years. Develop your energy instinct and learn how much your home costs to run. Get a better understanding of how your home uses energy and say goodbye to bill shock!

CUT YOUR CARBON FOOTPRINT
Saving energy is a great place to start if you want to cut your carbon footprint. Then you can progress to bigger green measures like installing a heat pump or switching to an EV to reduce your impact further. Calculate your journey to net-zero with Loop’s carbon calculator.

FREE SMART TECH HACK
Whether you’ve lost your smart meter in-home-display, you haven’t been given one or you simply want to get more from your data, Loop can help. Access your smart meter data on your smartphone for free, with no in-home-display needed.

If you have any questions, please contact our Support Team on support@loop.homes.
descriptionShort: The smart way to cut energy bills. Got a smart meter? Make it smarter with Loop!

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
You asked, we delivered! Gas is back in the Loop.

Whilst we were at it, we’ve also improved performance, sorted out a few pesky bugs and given the dashboard a makeover so we can share content with you more easily. As always, we’d love to get your feedback or to answer your questions so get in touch via support@loop.homes.

descriptionShort: The smart way to cut energy bills. Got a smart meter? Make it smarter with Loop!

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: Helping your smart meter to be smarter.  As ever, there are bits you can see and bits you can't see in this release. We've been tuning up the app to improve the user experience and we've also made a few small changes to a couple of the key screens, including a ‘refresh’ button to make it easier to refresh your data. We hope you find Loop is an easy way to get to grips with your energy use, as it's never been more important to be energy smart.

descriptionShort: The smart way to cut energy bills. Got a smart meter? Make it smarter with Loop!

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: Say Hello to Year view! In this release, we’ve made it even easier to keep on top of your energy usage with the introduction of Year view. You’ll notice this addition in the Track navigation, simply switch between views. Find out how your annual usage compares and beat it! As energy costs rise and the days get shorter and colder, it’s never been more important to save energy. The less you use, the less you pay. We’ve also been enhancing the app, to ensure you always have the best experience.

With spiralling energy prices and the climate emergency, there has never been a better time to take back control of your energy use. Simply download the Loop app, set up your account, then benefit from all Loop’s great energy-saving features. Loop is independent of your utility and is free to use for any household with a smart meter.

LEVEL UP YOUR EFFICIENCY
Efficiency has never been so important. On average Loop users reduce their usage by 10%. That’s a significant saving but many save much, much more. We help you understand what’s using the most energy in your home so you can make sensible decisions about what you use and when.

TURN OFF THE ALWAYS-ON
Phantom Load is our name for the stuff you leave on all the time. On average Phantom Load accounts for a third of an average household's electricity bill…but it doesn’t have to! Understand how much it’s costing you, how you compare to other households like yours, then make smart choices about which things to turn off.

️TEST SOLAR BEFORE INVESTING
Using your energy data, details about your house and weather information, we can show you the actual difference solar power could make to your monthly bills and your reliance on grid energy. Find out if it makes sense for you before investing with Loop’s unique solar simulator.

MONITOR YOUR HOME AND TRAIN YOUR ENERGY INSTINCT
Whilst your smart meter’s in-home display shows you what you’re using right now, Loop can help you track back over hours, days, weeks, months and years. Develop your energy instinct and learn how much your home costs to run. Get a better understanding of how your home uses energy and say goodbye to bill shock!

CUT YOUR CARBON FOOTPRINT
Saving energy is a great place to start if you want to cut your carbon footprint. Then you can progress to bigger green measures like installing a heat pump or switching to an EV to reduce your impact further. Calculate your journey to net-zero with Loop’s carbon calculator.

FREE SMART TECH HACK
Whether you’ve lost your smart meter in-home-display, you haven’t been given one or you simply want to get more from your data, Loop can help. Access your smart meter data on your smartphone for free, with no in-home-display needed.

descriptionShort: The smart way to cut energy bills. Got a smart meter? Make it smarter with Loop!
title: Loop Energy

creator: Trust Power Ltd
descriptionHtml:
Got a smart meter? Make it smarter with Loop! Slash your energy costs with Loop's free smart meter app! On average Loop users cut electricity costs by 16% and gas by 10%. Join them!


### New feature alert ###
Get smart about carbon with Loop.
Our new dashboard feature simplifies slashing your carbon footprint. The home screen shifts colours to display how much carbon is being released to power the national grid - it's called 'grid carbon intensity'. This shows how eco-friendly or not your electricity is right now. Plus, you get a 24-hour forecast. Armed with this information, Loop users can now decide when to use energy as well as how to cut down overall. Think of it like calories being printed on a menu, helping you to make smart choices! For example, we know many of our users would prefer to do energy-hungry tasks when they're least polluting. This new feature makes that possible. Together, we can make a big difference. Let us know how you get on!




Turn Your Smart Meter into a Money-Saver.
Your smart meter alone won't cut costs. Let Loop show you how.


Ditch High Bills, Go Loop!
Rising energy prices? Fight back with Loop's free app.


Master Your Energy Usage!
Loop's app makes saving 10% on your energy costs a breeze. You could save even more!


Kill Phantom Load, Save Cash!
Phantom Load: your hidden bill booster. Loop helps you tackle it.


Try Solar Risk-Free!
Thinking about solar? Test the waters with Loop's solar simulator.


Ask Alexa
Monitor your energy usage with Loop remotely on your smartphone and with an Alexa-enabled device. It's never been easier to keep on top of your costs. Just ask out loud how much you've spent on energy!


Use energy at the cleanest times
Find out when electricity is cleanest and change your habits to make a difference.


Track, Learn, Save!
Loop's app: the energy tracker that kills bill shock.


Crush Your Carbon Footprint!
Start with energy savings, then level up with Loop's carbon calculator.


Smart Tech Hack, No Catch!
Lost your meter display? No sweat. Loop's got your data covered.


Questions? Contact Us!
Need help? Reach out at support@loop.homes.

Got a smart meter? Make it smarter with Loop! Slash your energy costs with Loop's free smart meter app! On average Loop users cut electricity costs by 16% and gas by 10%. Join them!


### New feature alert ###
Get smart about carbon with Loop.
Our new dashboard feature simplifies slashing your carbon footprint. The home screen shifts colours to display how much carbon is being released to power the national grid - it's called 'grid carbon intensity'. This shows how eco-friendly or not your electricity is right now. Plus, you get a 24-hour forecast. Armed with this information, Loop users can now decide when to use energy as well as how to cut down overall. Think of it like calories being printed on a menu, helping you to make smart choices! For example, we know many of our users would prefer to do energy-hungry tasks when they're least polluting. This new feature makes that possible. Together, we can make a big difference. Let us know how you get on!




Turn Your Smart Meter into a Money-Saver.
Your smart meter alone won't cut costs. Let Loop show you how.


Ditch High Bills, Go Loop!
Rising energy prices? Fight back with Loop's free app.


Master Your Energy Usage!
Loop's app makes saving 10% on your energy costs a breeze. You could save even more!


Kill Phantom Load, Save Cash!
Phantom Load: your hidden bill booster. Loop helps you tackle it.


Try Solar Risk-Free!
Thinking about solar? Test the waters with Loop's solar simulator.


Ask Alexa
Monitor your energy usage with Loop remotely on your smartphone and with an Alexa-enabled device. It's never been easier to keep on top of your costs. Just ask out loud how much you've spent on energy!


Use energy at the cleanest times
Find out when electricity is cleanest and change your habits to make a difference.


Track, Learn, Save!
Loop's app: the energy tracker that kills bill shock.


Crush Your Carbon Footprint!
Start with energy savings, then level up with Loop's carbon calculator.


Smart Tech Hack, No Catch!
Lost your meter display? No sweat. Loop's got your data covered.


Questions? Contact Us!
Need help? Reach out at support@loop.homes.

title: Loop Energy

creator: Trust Power Ltd
descriptionHtml:
Got a smart meter? Make it smarter with Loop! On average Loop users cut their energy use by 15% - that’s around £250. Join them! Slash your energy costs with Loop's free smart meter app!

### Get rewarded for using less energy this winter ###
As well as cutting energy use by an average of 15%, Loop was one of the first to reward customers for reducing their peak electricity use last winter through our Turn Down and Save scheme. We're back to do it again this year!

Last year we paid participants over £100k, whilst our amazing Loop Community donated over £20k of their rewards to one of the UK's top energy poverty charities!


Turn Down and Save rewards Loop users for using less electricity during a number of national energy-saving 'events' held when the demand is highest. From November, there will be at least ten events across the winter, each lasting for an hour or more.

To take part, download the Loop app and set up your account. Then simply open the app and click on the Sign Up button on the home screen.


You can find out more about Turn Down and Save on our FAQ page: https://loop.homes/turn-down-and-save-faqs/


Got a smart meter? Make it smarter with Loop! On average Loop users cut their energy use by 15%. Join them!


Unlock The Power of Your Smart Meter
Your smart meter alone won't cut costs. That’s where Loop can help.


Master Your Energy Usage
On average Loop users cut energy use by 15%. How much could you save?


Turn Down and Save
Earn rewards for using less at peak times this winter.


Cut Phantom Load, Save Cash
Phantom Load is the wasted energy making up 30% of your bill. We’ll help you cut it.


Try Solar Risk-Free
Thinking about installing solar panels? Calculate your savings with Loop's solar simulator.


Ask Alexa
Monitor your energy usage with Loop remotely on your smartphone and with an Alexa-enabled device.


Use energy at greener times
Loop’s EcoMeter shows you when electricity is cleanest. Change your habits and make a difference!


Crush Your Carbon Footprint!
Discover your household’s roadmap to net-zero with Loop's carbon calculator.


No in-home-display? No problem!
Whether your display is broken or you were never given one, access your smart meter data with Loop.


Questions? Contact Us!
Email support@loop.homes.
descriptionShort: The smart way to cut energy use by 15%. Make your smart meter smarter with Loop!
